name: SubtleCrypto.importKey
description: The importKey() method of the SubtleCrypto interface imports a key: that is, it takes as input a key in an external, portable format and gives you a CryptoKey object that you can use in the Web Crypto API.

refs.name: Web Cryptography API
refs.description: The definition of 'SubtleCrypto.importKey()' in the 'Web Cryptography API' specification.
